tool_description: Creates structured summaries of academic texts, identifying key points, methodology, findings, and conclusions from research papers.

text_content.description: Full text or abstract to summarize

focus_areas.description: Specific aspects to emphasize (methodology, results, implications, limitations)

research_field.description: Academic field for context (e.g., psychology, computer_science, biology)

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content to summarize.
Invalid summary length: Use brief, medium, or detailed.
Invalid focus area: Use methodology, results, implications, or limitations.
Text too short: Content must be at least 100 characters for meaningful summarization.
Processing error: Unable to generate summary due to text complexity or encoding issues.
usage: Provide text_content to summarize. Optionally specify summary_length (brief/medium/detailed), focus_areas array, and research_field for contextualized summarization.

key_findings.description: List of key findings or results
